page.title: 16WEST STROUD SHOPPING TRENDS
page.content: Most people shop locally for everyday items though many people shop in bulk for food at fortnightly or monthly intervals at superstores in Gloucester. People without transport buy their food at local supermarkets. Food comes to the area from all over the world. A survey at the local supermarket showed that most people shopped for a family on a weekly basis from a wide choice of food. For clothes, furniture, electrical goods and luxury items, most people did not shop locally, preferring to travel to Gloucester, Cheltenham, Cirencester or Bristol.
